messages.messageBody:
Homeschool Kids Magazine
Update 16 January 2002
----------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------

Hello everyone,

I thought I'd send you a newsletter to let you know the latest
regarding our very first issue (due February 1st)!

We have about 7 poems and 5 stories so far. However, please don't
forget to share what you are doing in unit studies, or your favourite
math problem or recipe. Plus we have a new category for jokes! We
also need items for beauty (including inner beauty), and fashion.
Plus arts & crafts and hobbies. Get those items in now! We're
waiting!

Looking forward to your eager and enthusiastic response!

Mrs T.
Editor
http://www.geocities.com/homeschool_kids_magazine
----------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------
----
